summary: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.
cast: Marlene Dietrich|Victor McLaglen|Gustav von Seyffertitz|Warner Oland|Lew Cody|Barry Norton|Max Barwyn|B.F. Blinn|Allan Cavan|Davison Clark|Alexis Davidoff|William B. Davidson|Walter Downing|Geraldine Dvorak|Adolph Faylauer|Joseph W. Girard|Al Hart|Ramsay Hill|George Irving|Ethan Laidlaw|Tom London|Wilfred Lucas|Ruth Mayhew|Harold Nelson|Paul Panzer|Bill Powell|Buddy Roosevelt|Scott Seaton|Harry Semels
title: Fatalidad
